text: Mike Greenberg (born August 6, 1967) is a television personality with ESPN. He has hosted SportsCenter, ESPN Radio SportsCenter, and Mike and Mike in the Morning with Mike Golic. He also hosted the game show Duel on the ABC Network. He worked as a play-by-play announcer, with Golic, on ESPN's coverage of the Arena Football League. From 2007-2009, Golic and Greenberg worked as the #2 announcers for Monday Night Football. They were replaced by Brad Nessler and Trent Dilfer. They continue to anchor SportsCenter and host their radio show Mike and Mike in the Morning. Greenberg was also an anchor on ESPNEWS. Greenberg was born in New York City. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:People from New York City Category:SportsCenter anchors and reporters Category:Arena Football League broadcasters Category:National Football League broadcasters
title: Mike Greenberg
